channel.title: Arena Expert/Champion?
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Arena Expert/Champion?" - In Siggys

item.title: Re: Arena Expert/Champion?
item.content:encoded:
You get the Arena Expert effect for reduced entry price at the arena at 100 wins even if you're Season 1, but you don't get the title in your sig just for that. I'm a little over 150 wins, with the power and arena favorite, without anything special in my sig.

Here's to looking forward to it in Season 2 though.

item.title: Re: Arena Expert/Champion?
item.content:encoded:
Oh, I guess I was right. =P Thanks, Uzuki!

Hmm… I guess I really could get arena expert as season one… Just 8.5 more wins! :D

item.title: Re: Arena Expert/Champion?
item.content:encoded: It's 100, 250, 500, and 1000 wins and having the arena favorite item that gets you the sig.

item.title: Arena Expert/Champion?
item.content:encoded:
I've seen that some people's siggys have "Arena Expert" and "Arena Champion" in them. I'm assuming that Champ is either have gotten Doughman or obtained the 15 win item, and Expert is when you have the bloodline. I've also only ever seen them in season 2+ characters, so I'm assuming that you need to be season 2 to obtain them. I also have gotten both the arena favorite and a power, and I'm season one, and I haven't gotten it yet either.
Wait, or is this when you achieve 100, 250, 500, and 1000 wins in the arena? I was just gonna ask about this, but maybe this is it.
